faq.a: For hotel staff in Zimbabwe, a tip of 1-2 units of local currency per bag for porters and a few units for housekeeping is customary, but not obligatory.

faq.q: Is service charge included in Zimbabwe?
faq.a: Some restaurants in Zimbabwe may include a service charge, but this is not common. Always check your bill. If service is not included, a 10% tip is appreciated.

name: Zimbabwe
intro: How much to tip in Zimbabwe? Tipping in Zimbabwe is not mandatory, but it is a common practice in restaurants, bars, hotels, and taxis. Most locals leave around 10% in restaurants, and small change in bars and taxis. Learn all about tipping customs, etiquette, and the best practices for travelers in Zimbabwe.
